text: Mwaattiva phi ashaana a Nakare, nttwarattwaraka nikakata na athumwaninyu. Toka machokholhelho yayo arii owiiva ahikhalhaka mu ikekhiani, ukhalhawaya ikeekhene khiiwo nhina mwaya. Kila vanolhumacha aya, aneera wo ulhikaana ni mayareelho aya, ukhalhawaya arii owoothacha ni anaangoro o woothacha wonkhaye.
